meanings.sent1: The small, skittery squirrel darted across the yard.
meanings.sent2: The skittery kitten leaped playfully around the room.
meanings.sent3: The skittery rabbit hopped around in circles, trying to catch its own tail.
meanings.sent4: Her skittery movements resembled a jittery dancer on stage.
meanings.sent5: The skittery spider scurried across the floor, making everyone jump in surprise.

meanings.sent1: The leaves skittery across the pavement in the wind.
meanings.sent2: I watched the paper airplane skittery through the air before landing on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The ball skittery across the field, evading the players trying to catch it.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers skittery over the piano keys, creating a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel skittery up the tree trunk, moving with agility and speed.

meanings.sent1: The skittery cat jumped at the sound of a door closing.
meanings.sent2: The skittery deer ran off into the woods at the slightest noise.
meanings.sent3: The skittery dog barked at its own reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her skittery reaction to the thunderstorm was to hide under the blankets.
meanings.sent5: The skittery child clung to their parent's hand, afraid of the dark hallway.
